info.title: Records365 vNext Connector API
info.description: This is the Records365 vNext Connector API Home

get.summary: Gets a collection of aggregations that match a single metadata field value.

parameters.name: fieldName
parameters.description: The name of the metadata field.

parameters.name: fieldValue
parameters.description: The required value of the metadata field.

parameters.name: pagesize
parameters.description: The maximum number of items to return.

200.description: Returned if the request was processed successfully.

post.summary:
Submits aggregations to Records365 vNext.
All aggregations are to be submitted to this endpoint.

202.description: Returned if the specified resource was accepted for processing successfully.

put.summary: Submits a content source event to the Records365 vNext audit log.

204.description: Returned if the resource was updated successfully.

post.summary: Submits a binary to be archived and protected by Records365 vNext.

parameters.name: ConnectorId
parameters.description: The ID of the connector submitting the binary

parameters.name: ItemExternalId
parameters.description: The ExternalID of the item that the binary belongs to

parameters.name: FileName
parameters.description: An optional file name to associate with the binary

200.description: Returned if the request was processed successfully.

post.summary: Get SAS Token for blob Resource

202.description: Returned if the specified resource was accepted for processing successfully.

post.summary: Notifies Records365 that a new Binary has been uploaded

200.description: Returned if the request was processed successfully.

get.summary: Gets a connector configure model by its connector ID.

200.description: Returned if the request was processed successfully.

get.summary: Get all connectors for the given clientId across all tenants

200.description: Returned if the request was processed successfully.

get.summary: Gets a collection of items that match a single metadata field value.

parameters.name: fieldName
parameters.description: The name of the metadata field.

parameters.name: fieldValue
parameters.description: The required value of the metadata field.

parameters.name: pagesize
parameters.description: The maximum number of items to return.

200.description: Returned if the request was processed successfully.

post.summary:
Submits an item to be managed by Records365 vNext.
All records are to be submitted to this endpoint.

202.description: Returned if the specified resource was accepted for processing successfully.

get.summary: Gets a collection of notifications that are awaiting processing and acknowledgement by the connector.

200.description: Returned if the request was processed successfully.

post.summary: Acknowledges a notification as having been processed by the connector.

200.description: Returned if the request was processed successfully.

id.description: Internal unique ID for the aggregation

itemType.description: The item type that corresponds to an aggregation

itemNumber.description: The record number, format that corresponds to an aggreagtion

createdDate.description: The date and time of when the aggregation was created in Records365 vNext

createdBy.description: Name of the user or principal that created the aggregation

lastModifiedDate.description: The date and time of when the aggregation was modified in Records365 vNext

lastModifiedBy.description: Name of the user or principal that last modified the aggregation

contentSource.description: The name of the content source of the Connector that created the aggregation

isVitalRecord.description: True if the aggregation is a vital record, false otherwise

sourceProperties.description: Source properties for the aggregation as populated from the content source

externalId.description: The unique identifier of the aggregation in the content source

connectorId.description: Id of the Connector that created the aggregation

title.description: The title of the aggregation in the content source

sourceLastModifiedDate.description: The date and time when the aggregation was last modified in the content source. Must be in UTC and ISO-8601 Round-trip format

sourceLastModifiedBy.description: The name of the user or principal who last modified the aggregation in the content source

sourceCreatedDate.description: The date and time when the aggregation was created in the content source. Must be in UTC and ISO-8601 Round-trip format

sourceCreatedBy.description: The name of the user or principal who created the aggregation in the content source

location.description:
A pointer to a aggregation's location.
For example, the operating system path name or the location of a file cabinet

mediaType.description: The media type, if set to empty, then the media type will default to "Electronic"

parentExternalId.description: Gets or sets a parent of an aggregation

barcodeType.description: The barcode type e.g. code 128, qr code

barcodeValue.description: The barcode value of the above barcode type

recordCategoryId.description: The Record Category ID assigned by manual classification

itemTypeId.description: The item type ID that corresponds to an aggregation

sourceProperties.description: Source properties for the aggregation with DisplayName

externalId.description: The unique identifier of the aggregation in the content source

connectorId.description: Id of the Connector that created the aggregation

title.description: The title of the aggregation in the content source

sourceLastModifiedDate.description: The date and time when the aggregation was last modified in the content source. Must be in UTC and ISO-8601 Round-trip format

sourceLastModifiedBy.description: The name of the user or principal who last modified the aggregation in the content source

sourceCreatedDate.description: The date and time when the aggregation was created in the content source. Must be in UTC and ISO-8601 Round-trip format

sourceCreatedBy.description: The name of the user or principal who created the aggregation in the content source

location.description:
A pointer to a aggregation's location.
For example, the operating system path name or the location of a file cabinet

mediaType.description: The media type, if set to empty, then the media type will default to "Electronic"

parentExternalId.description: Gets or sets a parent of an aggregation

barcodeType.description: The barcode type e.g. code 128, qr code

barcodeValue.description: The barcode value of the above barcode type

recordCategoryId.description: The Record Category ID assigned by manual classification

RelationshipDataModel.description: Represents a relationship between the current item and a related one

relationshipType.description: Type of relationship, acceptable values: Part

ErrorResponseModel.description:
Top level error response object.
Defined by Microsoft REST API design guidelines:
https://github.com/Microsoft/api-guidelines/blob/master/Guidelines.md#710-response-formats

ErrorModel.description:
Error object.
Defined by Microsoft REST API design guidelines:
https://github.com/Microsoft/api-guidelines/blob/master/Guidelines.md#710-response-formats

ConnectorAuditEventModel.description: Represents an audit event in a content source.

eventExternalId.description: The ID of the audit event in the content source

connectorId.description: The connector ID. Unique ID of the submitting connector

createdDate.description: The date and time when the audit event was created / action was performed. Must be in UTC and ISO-8601 Round-trip format

eventType.description: The type of event being audited

description.description: Description of the event being audited

userId.description: ID of the user that executed the event being audited

userName.description: Username of the user that executed the event being audited

itemExternalId.description: The external ID of the item that this audit event relates to

sourceProperties.description: List of auditing properties specific to the content source where the event was originated

mimeType.description: Mime type of the binary to submit into blob

fileSize.description: FileSize of the binary to submit into blob

fileHash.description: FileHash of the binary to use in ML

connectorId.description: The ID of the connector submitting the binary

itemExternalId.description: The ExternalID of the item that the binary belongs to

fileName.description: An optional file name to associate with the binary

ConnectorConfigModel.description:
Connector configuration. 
Connector configuration models are designed to be "one size fits all", 
that is, this model schema is designed to be able to be used for all 
connector types.

transactionId.description: Current Transaction ID on this object

connectorTypeId.description: ID of the ConnectorType for this instance

status.description:
"Enabled" if the connector is enabled, "Disabled" if disabled,
"Error" if in error state
Must be set to "Disabled" when connector is being created
Can be set to "Enabled", if connector is authorized in content source
and aggregation level and versioning level are provided

statusCode.description: String containing general reason for last connector error state

createdDate.description: Date and time that this connector instance was created

modifiedDate.description: Date and time that this connector instance was last modified

createdBy.description: Username of the user that created this connector instance

modifiedBy.description: Username of the user that last modified this connector instance

tenantId.description: The ID of the Records365 vNext tenant that owns this connector instance

tenantDomainName.description: The domain name of the Records365 vNext tenant that owns this connector instance

originatingOrganization.description: Originating organization field to map with the name of the organization the connector is connecting to

enabledHistory.description: True if this connector has ever been enabled in its lifetime, false otherwise. This is a read-only property

displayName.description: The display name for this connector instance

hasSubmittedData.description: Whether the connector has submitted any items

properties.description: Custom properties for the connector instance

clientId.description:
Client ID of the OAuth 2.0 Application (e.g., 
an Azure AD Application) that represents this Connector.
Is used instead of the Connector Type's Client ID if present

protectionEnabled.description: Whether or not binary protection is enabled for this connector

filters.description: Filters records based on Excluded and Included properties

FiltersModel.description: Filters records based on Excluded and Included properties.

SearchTreeNodeModel.description: Groups multiple filters to allow for complex searching

boolOperator.description:
Boolean operators for building the search expression
Must be "OR" or "AND"

SearchTermModel.description:
Represents a single search per field
eg. ItemTypeId:'0' would have FieldName="ItemTypeId", Operator="Equal" and Value="0"

id.description: Internal unique ID for the item

itemType.description: Defines the type of the item

itemNumber.description: The internal Records365 vNext item number given to the submitted item

format.description: The mime format of the submitted item as determined from the file extension

lastModifiedDate.description: The date and time of when the item was last modified in Records365 vNext

lastModifiedBy.description: The identifier of who or what last modified the item in Records365 vNext

createdDate.description: The date and time of when the item was created in Records365 vNext

createdBy.description: The identifier of who or what created the record in Records365 vNext

contentSource.description: The name of content source from which the item was submitted

connectorDisplayName.description: The name of the connector that submitted the item

isVitalRecord.description: True if the item is a vital record, false otherwise

originatingOrganization.description: The name of the organization that submitted the item

previousDisposalAction.description: Previous disposal action taken on this item

previousDisposalDate.description: Date of when the previous disposal action was taken on this item

previousDisposalBy.description: The user name of the user who completed the last disposal action

previousDisposalById.description: For auditing purposes, the ID of the user who completed the last disposal action

nextDisposalAction.description: Next disposition phase action to be taken on this item

currentDisposalStatus.description: The current disposal status of the item, e.g. "Destroyed", "Disposal In-Progress", "Error" etc

sourceProperties.description: Source properties for the item as populated from the content source

correlationId.description: An ID to be used to correlate an item with events in Records365 vNext

externalId.description: The item external ID. This can be anything, but make sure it's unique to the external content source

connectorId.description: The connector ID. Unique ID of the submitting connector

title.description: The title of the submitted item

author.description:
The person, office, or designated position responsible for creation or issuance of a document.  
The author, originator, or creator is usually indicated on the letterhead or by signature.  
For RMA purposes, the author, originator, or creator may be designated as a person, official title, office symbol, or code

mimeType.description: The mime type of the submitted item

sourceLastModifiedDate.description: The date and time that the item was last modified in the content source. Must be in UTC and ISO-8601 Round-trip format

sourceLastModifiedBy.description: The name of the user or principal that last modified the item in the content source

sourceCreatedBy.description: The name of the user or principal that created the item in the content source

sourceCreatedDate.description: The date and time that the item was created in the content source. Must be in UTC and ISO-8601 Round-trip format

contentVersion.description: The version as stored in the content source

location.description:
A pointer to a record???s location.  
Examples: an operating system path and filename, the location cited within a file plan, or the location of a magnetic tape rack

mediaType.description: The media type, if set to empty, then the media type will default to "Electronic"

parentExternalId.description: A pointer to a record???s aggregation

barcodeType.description: The barcode type, this can be empty

barcodeValue.description: The barcode value of the above barcode type

externalId.description: The item external ID. This can be anything, but make sure it's unique to the external content source

connectorId.description: The connector ID. Unique ID of the submitting connector

title.description: The title of the submitted item

author.description:
The person, office, or designated position responsible for creation or issuance of a document.  
The author, originator, or creator is usually indicated on the letterhead or by signature.  
For RMA purposes, the author, originator, or creator may be designated as a person, official title, office symbol, or code

mimeType.description: The mime type of the submitted item

sourceLastModifiedDate.description: The date and time that the item was last modified in the content source. Must be in UTC and ISO-8601 Round-trip format

sourceLastModifiedBy.description: The name of the user or principal that last modified the item in the content source

sourceCreatedBy.description: The name of the user or principal that created the item in the content source

sourceCreatedDate.description: The date and time that the item was created in the content source. Must be in UTC and ISO-8601 Round-trip format

contentVersion.description: The version as stored in the content source

location.description:
A pointer to a record???s location.  
Examples: an operating system path and filename, the location cited within a file plan, or the location of a magnetic tape rack

mediaType.description: The media type, if set to empty, then the media type will default to "Electronic"

parentExternalId.description: A pointer to a record???s aggregation

barcodeType.description: The barcode type, this can be empty

barcodeValue.description: The barcode value of the above barcode type

ItemAcceptanceModel.description: Represents acknowledgment of item being submitted for further processing

externalId.description: An external id of an item that has been submitted for processing

sourceLastModifiedDate.description: DateTime stamp when item has been modified in content source

aggregationStatus.description:
Returns "Found" - if aggregation exists in Records365 vNext, "Not found" - if aggregation cannot be found in Records365 vNext
"Unknown" is a default value and can be returned in case of exception during search for aggregation

ConnectorNotificationModel.description: A notification sent to the Content Source

id.description:
Gets or sets unique ID of this notification. The receiver may use
this value to deduplicate incoming notifications

notificationType.description:
Gets or sets type of notification. Possible values include:
'ItemDestroyed', 'Ping', 'ConnectorConfigAdded',
'ConnectorConfigUpdated', 'ConnectorConfigDeleted'

timestamp.description:
Gets or sets UTC timestamp that indicates when the event occured in
Records365 vNext

tenantId.description:
Gets or sets the ID of the Records365 vNext tenant that relates to
this notification

connectorId.description:
Gets or sets the ID of the connector instance that relates to this
notification

item.description:
Gets or sets the item which this notification relates to. Null if
the notification relates to a connector

connectorConfig.description:
Gets or sets the connector configuraiton which this notification
relates to. Null if the notification relates to an item

ConnectorNotificationAcknowledgeModel.description: Information sent by a connector to acknowledge that it has processed a notification.

connectorId.description: Id of the Connector that processed the notification

notificationId.description: Id of the Notification being acknowledged

processingResult.description: Processing result of the notification. May be OK, Unknown, ConnectorDisabled, ConnectorNotSubscribed, ConnectorNotReachable, NotificationError

connectorStatusMessage.description: An optional message from the connector to be added to the items metadata on the "ConnectorStatusMessage" field
